ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | nvop2.1 | |- W = ( 1st ` U ) |
| 2 |  | nvop2.6 | |- N = ( normCV ` U ) |
| 3 |  | #P_nvrel | |- Rel NrmCVec |
| 4 |  | #P_1st2nd | |- ( ( Rel NrmCVec /\ U e. NrmCVec ) -> U = <. ( 1st ` U ) , ( 2nd ` U ) >. ) |
| 5 | 3, 4 | #P_mpan | |- ( U e. NrmCVec -> U = <. ( 1st ` U ) , ( 2nd ` U ) >. ) |
| 6 | 2 | #P_nmcvfval | |- N = ( 2nd ` U ) |
| 7 | 1, 6 | #P_opeq12i | |- <. W , N >. = <. ( 1st ` U ) , ( 2nd ` U ) >. |
| 8 | 5, 7 | #P_syl6eqr | |- ( U e. NrmCVec -> U = <. W , N >. ) |
